comment.author: 7279101@N06
comment._content: The army only has a pantomime horse?  You'd have thought they could have found a real one.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: I believe the Army mascot is a mule. (Note the big ears.)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The game was played on November 29, 1913, at the Polo Grounds, in New York City. President Woodrow Wilson was among the spectators. Army sank the Navy and won, 22-9.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
